items.title: Karen Hao on the Empire of AI, AGI evangelists, and the cost of belief

items.summary:

During today’s Direct presentation it debuted a ton of exciting updates and new releases for Mario’s 40th, including a new teaser trailer and confirmation of The Super Mario Galaxy Movie. Among our EV deals this week, the standout is Lectric’s Endless Summer Sale that is seeing up to $720 savings across its e-bike bundles that start from $999, including the ongoing $500 price cut on its ONE Premium Long-Range Belt-Drive Commuter e-bike at its new low price. Another notable mention is the Vanpowers City Vanture Lightweight Urban Commuter e-bike that got a promo code to $799, with plenty more sales from various brands waiting for you below.

And if you’re prepping at-home backup or gearing up for outdoor adventures in fall, be sure to check out the many sales we’ve got rounded up from EcoFlow, Anker SOLIX, and Bluetti – and even early-bird launch savings on Jackery’s new HomePower 3600 Plus Power Station that’s seeing up to $2,300 savings.
